collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (6 total Queries, 6 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `apd`.`id`, `apd`.`status`, `apd`.`project_id`, `apd`.`task_title`, `apd`.`mode`, `apd`.`due_date`, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.name) FROM task_employee drt INNER JOIN tbl_employees t ON drt.emp_id = t.id WHERE drt.task_id = apd.id) as related_employee, (SELECT p.project_title FROM tbl_project p WHERE p.id = apd.project_id) as project_title, (SELECT e.name FROM tbl_employees e WHERE e.id = apd.assigned_by) as assignedby FROM `tasks` `apd` INNER JOIN `task_employee` `drt` ON `apd`.`id` = `drt`.`task_id` INNER JOIN `task_employee` `te` ON `te`.`task_id` = `apd`.`id` WHERE `apd`.`status` = 0 AND `apd`.`mode` = 0 AND `te`.`emp_id` = 1 GROUP BY `apd`.`id` ORDER BY `apd`.`id` DESC

SELECT `apd`.`id`, `apd`.`status`, `apd`.`project_id`, `apd`.`task_title`, `apd`.`mode`, `apd`.`due_date`, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.name) FROM task_employee drt INNER JOIN tbl_employees t ON drt.emp_id = t.id WHERE drt.task_id = apd.id) as related_employee, (SELECT p.project_title FROM tbl_project p WHERE p.id = apd.project_id) as project_title, (SELECT e.name FROM tbl_employees e WHERE e.id = apd.assigned_by) as assignedby FROM `tasks` `apd` INNER JOIN `task_employee` `drt` ON `apd`.`id` = `drt`.`task_id` INNER JOIN `task_employee` `te` ON `te`.`task_id` = `apd`.`id` WHERE `apd`.`status` = 1 AND `apd`.`mode` = 0 AND `te`.`emp_id` = 1 GROUP BY `apd`.`id` ORDER BY `apd`.`id` DESC

SELECT `apd`.`id`, `apd`.`status`, `apd`.`project_id`, `apd`.`task_title`, `apd`.`mode`, `apd`.`due_date`, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.name) FROM task_employee drt INNER JOIN tbl_employees t ON drt.emp_id = t.id WHERE drt.task_id = apd.id) as related_employee, (SELECT p.project_title FROM tbl_project p WHERE p.id = apd.project_id) as project_title, (SELECT e.name FROM tbl_employees e WHERE e.id = apd.assigned_by) as assignedby FROM `tasks` `apd` INNER JOIN `task_employee` `drt` ON `apd`.`id` = `drt`.`task_id` INNER JOIN `task_employee` `te` ON `te`.`task_id` = `apd`.`id` WHERE `apd`.`status` = 2 AND `apd`.`mode` = 0 AND `te`.`emp_id` = 1 GROUP BY `apd`.`id` ORDER BY `apd`.`id` DESC

SELECT `apd`.`id`, `apd`.`status`, `apd`.`project_id`, `apd`.`task_title`, `apd`.`mode`, `apd`.`due_date`, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.name) FROM task_employee drt INNER JOIN tbl_employees t ON drt.emp_id = t.id WHERE drt.task_id = apd.id) as related_employee, (SELECT p.project_title FROM tbl_project p WHERE p.id = apd.project_id) as project_title, (SELECT e.name FROM tbl_employees e WHERE e.id = apd.assigned_by) as assignedby FROM `tasks` `apd` INNER JOIN `task_employee` `drt` ON `apd`.`id` = `drt`.`task_id` INNER JOIN `task_employee` `te` ON `te`.`task_id` = `apd`.`id` WHERE `apd`.`status` = 3 AND `apd`.`mode` = 0 AND `te`.`emp_id` = 1 GROUP BY `apd`.`id` ORDER BY `apd`.`id` DESC
